name: Desert Bus For Hope Pack
white_cards: Accidentally broadcasting an NSFW video to 5,000 people.
An encyclopedic knowledge of Night Court.
Belting out the chorus of a popular song and mumbling through the rest.
Having no idea what the fuck is going on.
Shipping a fish brick to Ohio.
The D E V I C E.

black_cards.text: Ken "_____" Steacy went back into his archives and found his original sketches for _____.
The four shifts at Desert Bus: Dawn Guard, Alpha Flight, Night Watch and _____.
YOU try explaining _____ to the media!
